law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 12-108(p), (q), (v), and (w) of this title, the recordation tax applies to ...
law.text: Except as provided in § 12-108(p), (q), (v), and (w) of this title, the recordation tax applies to instruments of writing that transfer the real property of a corporation to its stockholders, the real property of a limited liability company to its members, or the real property of a partnership to its partners.
